==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かい|すい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From [[海]] (''kai'', "sea," "ocean") + [[水]] (''sui'', "water," "cold water")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かいすい}}

# [[seawater]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|海水パンツ|かいすい パンツ}}: men's bathing suit
* {{ja-r|海水温|かいすいおん}}: seawater temperature
* {{ja-r|海水魚|かいすいぎょ}}: saltwater fish
* {{ja-r|海水着|かいすいぎ}}: bathing suit
* {{ja-r|海水帽|かいすいぼう}}: bathing cap
* {{ja-r|海水浴|かいすいよく}}: sea bathing
* {{ja-r|海水浴場|かいすいよくじょう}}: swimming area
